# OnDemandResource

**Properties**

| Name             | Type | Required | Description                                                        |
| :--------------- | :--- | :------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| enabled          | bool | ❌       | Flag for controlling OnDemand Call Recording settings              |
| retention_period | int  | ❌       | Retention period of a call recording, the default value is 90 days |
